name: WELDING GREEK INSTITUTE
membership:
Member of European Welding Federation
Member of International Institute of Welding
memberOrga: more than 150 physical persons, and 60 Companies has currently membership with the Welding Greek Institute.
goal: The Welding Greek Institute is the National entity for Greece, related to the Welding technology diffussion training of personnel and certification of professionals.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: The Welding Greek Institute, follows the production of metallic products all over Greece, monitor the rules of certification for products, services and persons, according the European Norms and Standards, and guarantees the technology and innovation duffussion all over the National territory.
